function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of respiratory diseases via droplets and aerosols","Impact":"Risk of widespread transmission of COVID-19 and other respiratory diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to minimize the risk of transmission via droplets and aerosols","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, air purifiers, and use of face coverings","People":"General public, particularly in crowded or enclosed spaces","Owner":"Health authorities, building managers, and individuals"}]}
